item.title: Summary of Life Changing Selfhelp Books
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Dr. Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
Download Link to this Diary

  1. The Inspirational Leader by Gifford Thomas
  2. The 5 Elements of Effective Thinking by Edward B. Burger
  3. How to Listen by Trimboli
  4. Self-discipline in 10 Days by Theodore Bryant
  5. Finish What You Start by Peter Hollis
  6. Do It Today by Darius Foroux
  7. Rest: Why You Get More Done When You Work Less by Alex
  8. Focus: The Hidden Driver of Excellence by Daniel Goleman
  9. The 4 Disciplines of Execution by Chris McChesney
  10. How To Develop The Leader Within You by John C. Maxwell
  11. Your Next Five Moves by Patrick Bet David
  12. The Power of Intention by Wayne W. Dyer
  13. The Power of Your Subconscious Mind by Joseph Murphy
  14. The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho

item.title: AI ML Resources from My Diary
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Dr. Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
AI ML Resources from My Diary
#

This is my personal diary which contains resources, which I know, learned or people have told me to experiment with. I started writing this diary in Mar’ 2019. This diary is related to my work/learning in data science, AI, ML, NLP, DL, GNN, GAN, Statistics, etc. A few links related to Software Development, People Management, Project Management are also kept in this diary. The resources here are python/R library link, blog articles, YouTube video links, article links, AI products links, architecture, images etc. The Table of Content and Content of this diary is not any specific order. Whatever I was/am getting I keep adding into this, mostly towards the end but not always.
